text: Niscaya yisakale tomara ocarata ba'i'ata karae arasye te'omloke allahara hatatahe ba'i'ata karae. Allahara hata te'omlokara hatara oparata. Tara pichata yiye se'ito bhanga karaiba, se'i bhanga karaara parainama tarae'i oparata bartiba arau yiye allahara lagata karaa angikara purna karaiba taka allahe arasye mahapuraskara pradana karaiba
